author: William J. Broad
title: Chernobyl Plant Is Unharmed Despite Russian Invasion of Ukraine, Scientists Say
description: The nation’s 15 operating reactors have also been assessed as safe — at least for the moment.
content:
The stated readings, the agency added, are low and remain within the operational range measured in the Exclusion Zone since it was established, and therefore do not pose any danger to the public.
